name: TowerClimber
description:
Controls:
WSAD / Arrow keys - move
Left click - shoot
Space - roll
E - interact
ESC - pause

Each level is randomly generated. Some things like killing enemies, destroying stuff or opening chests give you points.
You can pick up ammo / heal at health boxes / open chests with E.
Chests always drop a random weapon. Enemies have a 50% chance to drop the weapon they're holding.

Made for the MashUp Game Jam 2022 (https://itch.io/jam/mashup-game-jam-2022)

The music:
"Hand Balance Redux" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
